headline: The Alter Ego of Mx. Thief Emerges
abstract: Ashlee Latimer fostered a young online community through the musical’s social media. Fans know her better as Mx. Thief.
lead_paragraph: The Twitter account for “The Lightning Thief: The Percy Jackson Musical” has more than 50,000 followers. Ashlee Latimer knows them better than most.
keywords: The Lightning Thief: The Percy Jackson Musical (Play)
